pullrequest.title: Add clipping for depth camera on rgbd camera sensor

content.raw:
> I’ve made <camera><depth_camera><clip> a required element that will be required if <depth_camera> is specified. Should this element be optional and if it exists, we simply prefer it over <camera><clip>?

Yeah, that sounds good to me.

> Additionally, how can I check to see if <depth_camera> or its respective clip values exists?

We can add `HasDepthCamera`, `HasDepthNearClip` and `HadDepthFarClip` to the `sdf::Camera` class? Also, consider renaming `NearDepthClip` to `DepthNearClip` and `FarDepthClip` -> `DepthFarClip` since the far/near clips are under depth.
content.html:
I’ve made <camera><depth_camera><clip> a required element that will be required if <depth_camera> is specified. Should this element be optional and if it exists, we simply prefer it over <camera><clip>?

Yeah, that sounds good to me.

Additionally, how can I check to see if <depth_camera> or its respective clip values exists?

We can add HasDepthCamera, HasDepthNearClip and HadDepthFarClip to the sdf::Camera class? Also, consider renaming NearDepthClip to DepthNearClip and FarDepthClip -> DepthFarClip since the far/near clips are under depth.
